articleContent.title: Business overview
articleContent.description: Stories: someone has an idea and seeking for a supplier, a current startup developing for the next round of investments. Write about startups growing and trends.

articleContent.title: Startup experience
articleContent.description:
The company was founded by three persons who have already deep experience in startup development and own product development.
In 2015, one of the founders developed a startup for the automatization of game servers processes. 
The idea was to make a game server that allows users to create their own server for gaming with friends online by two clicks with a minimal budget. We developed a web and mobile applications with the servers system managed by these apps. The product was in production and tested by real clients.
The next startup experience we got when the DigitalSuit has been already founded. It was some experiment that we wanted to realize.
That time engineers were facing a lot of issues with application setup in Clouds.
So, we got an idea to develop the product that could handle all issues and manage a complex of the deploy process from one place. We identified two significant problems: necessarily of handling sensitive data for deployment in real-time, and issues with setup few applications and how to use different clusters for flexibility and scalability.
So, our product successfully solved all this stuff. 
This startup experience gives us a unique vision of the business. It’s like a sort of mindfulness. We understand the pain and needs of our clients better than most. We are one blood or like-minded people as you wish. That’s why we resolve issues, find a win-win strategy faster than others, and deliver a successful product in an effective way.

technologies.description: This a library for UI creation based on the components. It enables the development of responsive UI and single page applications

It provides a full cycle of product/inventory management, shipping and delivery, and content management, allowing us to select different payment methods to use in our shop. All this stuff in Cloud, so no need for deployment. This is a quick start for online business. Also, a lot of useful plugins available for marketing.
It provides custom features, checkout page management, and high-level support. This is the right choice for big e-com websites with over 10,000 transactions per minute
This is the React Based Framework for website development using ReactJS. It provides great SEO optimization and dynamic content implementation.

BigCommerce - The platform provides all possibilities to quickly create e-commerce websites in Cloud, so deployment and DevOps services are needless. In-built products, logistic management, and payment service, custom integrations, and moreover make this platform a good alternative of Shopify.

It provides API and content management system for corporate or e-com websites. Quick setup, easy way for expending, integration with AWS services, and email agents. Strapi integrates with Shopify maintaining better SEO and content management for websites.
